title: [Development of the aeroplane: aviation 1915-1940]
brief_description: A documentary on the development of experimental and commercial aviation, 1915 to 1945, focusing mainly on the British contribution with recognition given to Lindbergh and Kingsford Smith. Beginning of film missing and title and credits not available.
